thread.title: Shamika
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Shamika

author: Shamika
title: Shamika
text: This is a great place to get furniture if you want something that looks nice and it won't hurt your wallet. The sales reps are polite and not overly pushy. I was able to put my sofa on layaway without any fees attached and got it delivered at home the same day I fully paid for it. I would go back when I need more furniture in the future.
